Arts and Leisure

The Youth Service provides and supports a range of educational services and social activities for children and young people aged between (enter minimum age) and 25 years of age.

Through a variety of youth clubs, centres, specialist projects and adventure playgrounds, many run in partnership with local voluntary organisations. We offer children and young people organised activities, expeditions, visits and trips away from home.

A list of organised activities for young people.
